com.burstly.lib.component
Class LayoutParametersResolver

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.LayoutParametersResolver

public class LayoutParametersResolver
extends Object

Resolves layout parameters from server response. Used in strictly defined layout sizes, such as ScriptView or GrayStripe. In general usefull, where implmenetation is based on WebView.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
